incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. This may temporarily affect Availability in the rack SBG0504B06C Start time : 19/12/2024 07:00 UTC End time : 19/12/2024 19:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers in this rack will be unreachable for 12 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 09/01/2025 06:30 UTC End time : 09/01/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in racks E105C04, E105C06 and E105C08 will be temporarily unavailable during the operation for 1 hour and 30 minutes each rack. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive cooling system work in racks E105C04, E105C06 and E105C08. Below is the schedule for the maintenance of the racks. 09/01/2025 07:30 UTC to 09/01/2025 09:00 UTC for the rack E105C04 09/01/2025 09:00 UTC to 09/01/2025 10:30 UTC for the rack E105C06 09/01/2025 10:30 UTC to 09/01/2025 12:00 UTC for the rack E105C08 Thank you for your understanding.
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 15/01/2025 13:00 UTC End time : 15/01/2025 17:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience a downtime of up to 20 minutes for each intervention. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. We have carefully planned and scheduled the interventions to minimize any potential impact on your services. The maintenance schedule is as follows: BHS4 : Start of intervention at 13:00 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T04A, T04B and T04C )
BHS5 : Start of intervention at 13:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H)
BHS6 : Start of intervention at 15:00 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G)
BHS7(first part) : Start of intervention at 15:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B702, B703, B707 and B709)
BHS7(second part) : Start of intervention at 16:30 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B710 and B716)
Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our OVHcloud Connect offer. This may affect functionality. Start time : 15/01/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 16/01/2025 01:00 UTC Service impact : During scheduled maintenance, dual-attachment customers may experience brief network disruption, while single-attachment customers will have temporary service interruption. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our OVHcloud Connect offer, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 20/01/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 24/01/2025 18:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our OVHcloud Connect offer. This may affect functionality. Start time : 20/01/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 21/01/2025 01:00 UTC Service impact : During scheduled maintenance, dual-attachment customers may experience brief network disruption, while single-attachment customers will have temporary service interruption. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our OVHcloud Connect offer, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. This may temporarily affect Availability in the rack SBG0504B06C Start time : 18/12/2024 07:00 UTC End time : 18/12/2024 19:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers in this rack will be unreachable for 12 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we will work on our cooling infrastructure in the rack SBG0504B06C. Thank you for your understanding.
